page.title: 19LAW AND ORDER IN DIPTON.
page.content: The village of Dipton is policed by officers at the sub police station at Catchgate.All the officers wear uniforms which are black with silver buttons.They wear helmets or flat caps if they are in a Panda,(Patrol Car). I interviewed P.C.Cowan & this is what he told me. {You have to be 18.5yrs.before you {join the Force.P.C.Cowan has been in {for 9yrs.The youngest officer in {Catchgate station is 22yrs.There are {no women in this station.They do not {have any Police Dogs and all officers {carry personal radios known as "walkie {talkies".This is so they can be in {contact with the station no matter {where they are,as they may be on car {patrol or walking their "beat". You are allowed to stay in the Force for 30 years then you retire with a special Pension...by DONNA CATTERMOLE.
